_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The things the K훮l훮mas should not rely o: Acceptance of a view after consideration
The things the K훮l훮mas should rely on [a: Things that lead to welfare and happiness
The four consolations won by a noble dis: Rebirth in a good place, a heavenly realm
Keeping oneself free of enmity and ill will, untroubled and happy
Seeing oneself pure on both sides
